column4: my first was in the 90s, like mentrix or....mandrake, yah...it was so obnoxious...I see in the OS section of the computer store, a boxed mandrake linux package...so I'm like sweet, it'll be like installing dos (it was back in the day)...and so I buy it and in the box is nothing but a big heavy book stuffed in it
no CD...it says download the latest version on the internet
don't need your life tale in here
try #ubuntu-offtopic if you want to chat
